subject: Re: [junit] Use JUnit for Integration Testing?
msgSnippet: ... I personally don t have much advice to give unless you reveal more about the kind of integration tests you re thinking of? -Lasse-
messageBody:
On 9/4/06, hitliubo <hitliubo@...> wrote:
> As we know, junit is a famous unit testing tool.
> but now, I want to use junit for the integration testing.
> Could all of you give me any advice?

I personally don't have much advice to give unless you reveal more
about the kind of integration tests you're thinking of?

-Lasse-
